title: Kazakhstan Plans $300 Million Crypto Reserve
description:
Kazakhstan’s central bank is weighing a plan to invest up to $300 million in cryptocurrency assets.

On November 28, Timur Suleimenov, chairman of the National Bank of Kazakhstan, said the bank could allocate funds from the National Fund and its foreign-exchange reserves into crypto.

title: National Bank of Kazakhstan Plans Up to $300M Crypto Investment
description:
Kazakhstan’s central bank is preparing to invest up to $300 million in crypto assets, though the final allocation could range between $50 million and $250 million, depending on market conditions.

According to RBC, National Bank of Kazakhstan (NBK) Chairman Timur Suleimenov announced the initiative ...

title: The Week in Kazakhstan: Not Very Well
description:

title: Bybit Kazakhstan Launches the Country’s First Fully Regulated P2P Platform
description:
Astana, Kazakhstan, November 26th, 2025, Chainwire

Bybit Limited (Bybit Kazakhstan), a crypto exchange licensed by the Astana Financial Services Authority (AFSA), has introduced a fully regulated peer-to-peer trading platform in Kazakhstan. The launch marks the country’s first P2P system operating ...

title: President Tokayev outlines vision for Kazakhstan, focuses on sustainable socio-economic growth
description:
Astana [Kazakhstan], September 6 (ANI): During an annual address, Kazakhstan President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev focused on sustainable socio-economic growth and a brighter future and emphasised the nation's key objectives, prioritising balanced socio-economic development.

title: Kazakhstan holds base rate but may have to hike in 2026
description:
At today's meeting, the National Bank of Kazakhstan (NBK) decided to keep the base rate unchanged at 18.00%, in line with the market and our expectations.

title: Inflation in Kazakhstan slows to 12.4% in November — statistics
description:
ASTANA, December 1. /TASS/. Kazakhstan’s inflation rate – whose recent acceleration prompted the government to adopt several economic measures – slowed down by 0.2 percentage points in November to 12.4% year-on-year, compared with 12.6% in October, the country’s National Statistics Bureau reported.

title: Annual inflation in Kazakhstan slowed to 12.6% in Oct
description:
03.11.2025, 13:41

Annual inflation in Kazakhstan slowed to 12.6% in Oct



ASTANA. Nov 3 (Interfax-Kazakhstan) - Inflation in Kazakhstan came in at 0.5% in October 2025, slowing down from 1.1% in September, said the National Statistics Bureau of the Agency for Strategic Planning and Reforms.
